title: Premium Shopping Cart Interface
description: A visually stunning and premium shopping cart interface with a corporate professional navy and gold theme, featuring a wizard step-by-step flow.

generation_hints.image_optimization: Use next/image for product avatars in cart table
generation_hints.wizard_flow: Implement step validation before allowing navigation to next step
generation_hints.step_indicator: Show visual progress with connected lines and status colors
generation_hints.form_validation: Use zod schema validation for shipping information form
generation_hints.professional_theme: Maintain corporate navy and gold color scheme throughout
